    "bodyText": "mobirise.com Mobirise v5.0.29HOMEABOUT USQUALITYCNC MILLINGPLUGSMOULDSMODELSSERVICECONTACTS US\nDENCAM COMPOSITE\nis the preferred partner when it comes to reliable and cost-effective composite tooling solutions where time-to market plays a key role in determining the success of the project.With many years of experience in the composite industry, skilled and competent staff and top-level quality assurance we guaranty our customers first-class products that are extremely accurate, consistent and durable in operation.The company's QHSE policy can be obtained by contacting CEO Jens Andersen or QHSE responsible Einar Andersen\nREAD MORE VIDEO CONTACT US\nABOUT US\nWith many years of experience in design and production of composite tooling solutions, we offer a wide range of composite products to support production in e.g. the wind, marine and automobile industries.Our high-precision 5-axis milling machines allow us to produce all kinds of shapes in all sizes within tolerances as low as 0.1 mm. This together with our extensive know-how give us endless production possibilities and our customers a guarantee of high quality and accurate products.   Tolerance measurement and alignment are integrated features in our quality assurance program and our ISO 9001 certification forms the natural platform for our quality efforts. To meet the requirements of complete traceability and to document the performance of our solutions, customized reports containing all relevant information are prepared.  With our technology, knowledge and capacity, we are also able to face challenges related to new and innovative composite solutions. We are prepared to expand our business scope and broaden our minds to remain a significant player in the composite industry.As an important part of our continued strive to deliver the best solutions to our customers, employees and the world around us, we have a strong focus on both safeguarding the working environment and reducing our environmental impact, and as part of this we are certified in both ISO 45001 and ISO 14001.\nDIRECT MOULD TECHNOLOGY\nFor prototypes and one-offs, a direct mould solution is the perfect choice. With this type of mould your project’s liquidity and time table will improve significantly and you will have no master plug taking up storage space.\nLEARN MORE\nMASTER PLUGS\nWith our three 5-axis CNC milling machines, working within tolerances of +/- 0.1 mm, we are able to manufacture extremely precise and durable master plugs.\nLEARN MORE\nMOULDS\nDencam is manufacturing moulds for industries such as the wind, auto and boat industry. Our moulds are of a high quality, cost-effective and stable. Lately, our focused innovation work has led to the development of the direct mould which is milled directly on our milling machines.\nLEARN MORE\nMODELS\nModels as a pre-step to the actual design and development phase or models for sculptures, art objects or the like can be produced with extreme accuracy on our milling machines.\nLEARN MORE\nQUALITY, H&S AND ENVIRONMENT\nTo remain our customers' preferred supplier of composite mould solutions, we strive to have good and solid management systems for quality as well as for the environment and working environment. Systems that are certified according to ISO standards and are continuously updated and maintained.QUALITYWe wish, through fulfillment of our customers’ demands and expectations, to be perceived as a trustworthy and customer-oriented supplier of consistent quality products and we always strive towards zero defect deliveries.In our line of business, our main area of thrust is quality, maintained and promoted by a highly qualified and dedicated team of employees. Our ISO 9001 certification forms the natural platform for our quality efforts, but we always seek to go beyond the basic requirements and take steps to detect and eliminate quality issues throughout our supply chain.    Scanners and laser tracking are used to provide precise accuracy and alignment of all of our products, and our choice of materials as well as suppliers are subject to comprehensive investigation and analysis. To document the proven performance of our solutions, customized reports containing all relevant information are prepared in order to meet the requirements of complete traceability.H&SDencam aims to be a health and safety conscious organization where a good and safe working environment is prioritized above all else. This is achieved through, among other things: - A broad-based health and safety organization with representatives from all parts and functions of the company. - Continuous improvement of training and instruction to eliminate or reduce risks where possible. - Daily safety rounds to monitor employee health and safety and to provide a basis for improving instructions and training. - Consciously work against abusive behavior, including bullying and sexual harassment. - Prevent any attempts at bribery and corruption.ENVIRONMENTOur ISO 14001 certification is the natural starting point for working with our environmental impact, but our work is not limited to this - we continuously seek inspiration and experience from our customers and suppliers and through participation in various forums and networks.We work continuously to minimize CO2 emissions by reducing oil/gas consumption and introducing energy-saving measures.  Where practical and economically feasible, we endeavor to use raw materials and consumables that cannot be replaced in use or disposal by less environmentally harmful alternatives and to reduce the company's consumption of irreplaceable resources by extending product life and recycling.\nQHSE - policy\n- Through close cooperation with our customers, we will constantly work to improve production methods, material choice and the company’s quality system.- Through close co-operation with our customers and suppliers, we will continuously work to improve production methods, material selection and the quality system in the company. Each employee must feel a personal responsibility to fulfil the goals and requirements, including legal requirements, set through visible quality management.- Dencam will maintain and continuously improve a quality, occupational health and safety and environmental management system in accordance with DS/EN ISO 9001:2015, ISO45001:2018 and DS/EN ISO 14001:2015, so that it always fits the organization’s purpose, framework and conditions.- Through financially sound business practices, Dencam will ensure that we are a competent, stable and trustworthy business partner for our customers!- Dencam will be a H&S and environmentally conscious organization, where the attitude towards H&S and the environment is translated into practical action with documented results.- Dencam does not endeavor to consume or sell products that in their use or disposal can be replaced by less environmentally harmful alternatives.- Dencam will continuously endeavor to reduce the companies' consumption of irreplaceable resources by, among other things, saving energy and extending the lifespan of products.- In the choice of raw materials and consumables, Dencam will constantly endeavor to reduce the environmental impact and strive for recycling where practical and economically feasible.- Dencam will obtain adequate information on all substances used in production and arising during the processes and use the knowledge gained as a basis for proper handling and in the assessment of alternatives.- Dencam will advise and, where appropriate, put pressure on suppliers and customers if deemed necessary for the implementation of the company's health, safety and environmental policy.- Dencam will monitor that the health and safety of employees is not jeopardized when working with company materials and processes, including reducing risks and eliminating work-related hazards wherever possible.- Dencam will endeavor to continuously improve the working conditions in the companies.- Dencam will ensure that all employees have the information, training, and work routines necessary to fulfil the working environment requirements and to avoid pollution.- Dencam works consciously against offensive behavior, including bullying and sexual harassment.- Human rights will be respected unconditionally.- Any form of attempted bribery and corruption is not accepted.- It is the responsibility of the company's senior management to communicate a continuous improvement philosophy throughout the organization with the aim of creating continuous improvements in quality, service and price to the customer base.- Dencam undertakes to comply with all legal and other applicable requirements imposed on the company.- Dencam undertakes to consult and involve employees, including AMO.\nMANAGEMENT\nCEO, Jens Andersenjda@dencam.com+45 2219 9971\nSALES / SERVICE\nBenjamin Loofbbl@dencam.com+45 6043 9990\nPURCHASE\nSøren Pedersensp@dencam.com+45 3137 6187\nQUALITY / H&S\nEinar Andersen\neia@dencam.com\n+45 2069 7678\nPRODUCTION MANAGEMENT\nPlug factory - FaaborgCarsten Hansencah@dencam.com+45 4087 6368Mould factory - RudkøbingRene Hansenrh@dencam.com+45 2835 5030Mould factory - KirkebyRene Hansenrh@dencam.com+45 2835 5030\nCFO / IT\nDavid Andersen dan@dencam.com+45 42915591\nACCOUNTING\nSusanne Viilesvl@dencam.com+45 3149 4524Please forward all invoices to:invoice@dencam.com\nDencam Composite Whistleblower Channel\nAs an employee, vendor, or customer you can report serious matters anonymously or if you have reasonable suspicion of such matters.Link for reporting incidents: https://whistleblowersoftware.com/secure/9a1b9bc9-76cd-45a6-b41f-a83c313947d2 Anonymous reporting of serious mattersThrough this page, you can submit information about reprehensible matters or report actions that are unethical, illegal or in violation of internal policies.The scheme is to be used to bring matters to light that would not otherwise have come to light.It can be reported confidentially with indication of name and contact information or, if desired, 100% anonymously.All inquiries are treated confidentially and securely.HR related mattersHR related matters cannot be reported in this system, but must instead be discussed with the immediate manager, director or HR.From this page you are able to make a new secure report or follow up on an acknowledges that Dencam Composite A/S is committed to conducting business in an ethical and socially responsible manner. Body Text URL_1:
mobirise.com Mobirise v5.0.29HOMEABOUT USQUALITYCNC MILLINGPLUGSMOULDSMODELSSERVICECONTACTS US
DENCAM COMPOSITE
is the preferred partner when it comes to reliable and cost-effective composite tooling solutions where time-to market plays a key role in determining the success of the project.With many years of experience in the composite industry, skilled and competent staff and top-level quality assurance we guaranty our customers first-class products that are extremely accurate, consistent and durable in operation.The company's QHSE policy can be obtained by contacting CEO Jens Andersen or QHSE responsible Einar Andersen
READ MORE VIDEO CONTACT US
ABOUT US
With many years of experience in design and production of composite tooling solutions, we offer a wide range of composite products to support production in e.g. the wind, marine and automobile industries.Our high-precision 5-axis milling machines allow us to produce all kinds of shapes in all sizes within tolerances as low as 0.1 mm. This together with our extensive know-how give us endless production possibilities and our customers a guarantee of high quality and accurate products.   Tolerance measurement and alignment are integrated features in our quality assurance program and our ISO 9001 certification forms the natural platform for our quality efforts. To meet the requirements of complete traceability and to document the performance of our solutions, customized reports containing all relevant information are prepared.  With our technology, knowledge and capacity, we are also able to face challenges related to new and innovative composite solutions. We are prepared to expand our business scope and broaden our minds to remain a significant player in the composite industry.As an important part of our continued strive to deliver the best solutions to our customers, employees and the world around us, we have a strong focus on both safeguarding the working environment and reducing our environmental impact, and as part of this we are certified in both ISO 45001 and ISO 14001.
DIRECT MOULD TECHNOLOGY
For prototypes and one-offs, a direct mould solution is the perfect choice. With this type of mould your project’s liquidity and time table will improve significantly and you will have no master plug taking up storage space.
LEARN MORE
MASTER PLUGS
With our three 5-axis CNC milling machines, working within tolerances of +/- 0.1 mm, we are able to manufacture extremely precise and durable master plugs.
LEARN MORE
MOULDS
Dencam is manufacturing moulds for industries such as the wind, auto and boat industry. Our moulds are of a high quality, cost-effective and stable. Lately, our focused innovation work has led to the development of the direct mould which is milled directly on our milling machines.
LEARN MORE
MODELS
Models as a pre-step to the actual design and development phase or models for sculptures, art objects or the like can be produced with extreme accuracy on our milling machines.
LEARN MORE
QUALITY, H&S AND ENVIRONMENT
To remain our customers' preferred supplier of composite mould solutions, we strive to have good and solid management systems for quality as well as for the environment and working environment. Systems that are certified according to ISO standards and are continuously updated and maintained.QUALITYWe wish, through fulfillment of our customers’ demands and expectations, to be perceived as a trustworthy and customer-oriented supplier of consistent quality products and we always strive towards zero defect deliveries.In our line of business, our main area of thrust is quality, maintained and promoted by a highly qualified and dedicated team of employees. Our ISO 9001 certification forms the natural platform for our quality efforts, but we always seek to go beyond the basic requirements and take steps to detect and eliminate quality issues throughout our supply chain.    Scanners and laser tracking are used to provide precise accuracy and alignment of all of our products, and our choice of materials as well as suppliers are subject to comprehensive investigation and analysis. To document the proven performance of our solutions, customized reports containing all relevant information are prepared in order to meet the requirements of complete traceability.H&SDencam aims to be a health and safety conscious organization where a good and safe working environment is prioritized above all else. This is achieved through, among other things: - A broad-based health and safety organization with representatives from all parts and functions of the company. - Continuous improvement of training and instruction to eliminate or reduce risks where possible. - Daily safety rounds to monitor employee health and safety and to provide a basis for improving instructions and training. - Consciously work against abusive behavior, including bullying and sexual harassment. - Prevent any attempts at bribery and corruption.ENVIRONMENTOur ISO 14001 certification is the natural starting point for working with our environmental impact, but our work is not limited to this - we continuously seek inspiration and experience from our customers and suppliers and through participation in various forums and networks.We work continuously to minimize CO2 emissions by reducing oil/gas consumption and introducing energy-saving measures.  Where practical and economically feasible, we endeavor to use raw materials and consumables that cannot be replaced in use or disposal by less environmentally harmful alternatives and to reduce the company's consumption of irreplaceable resources by extending product life and recycling.
QHSE - policy
- Through close cooperation with our customers, we will constantly work to improve production methods, material choice and the company’s quality system.- Through close co-operation with our customers and suppliers, we will continuously work to improve production methods, material selection and the quality system in the company. Each employee must feel a personal responsibility to fulfil the goals and requirements, including legal requirements, set through visible quality management.- Dencam will maintain and continuously improve a quality, occupational health and safety and environmental management system in accordance with DS/EN ISO 9001:2015, ISO45001:2018 and DS/EN ISO 14001:2015, so that it always fits the organization’s purpose, framework and conditions.- Through financially sound business practices, Dencam will ensure that we are a competent, stable and trustworthy business partner for our customers!- Dencam will be a H&S and environmentally conscious organization, where the attitude towards H&S and the environment is translated into practical action with documented results.- Dencam does not endeavor to consume or sell products that in their use or disposal can be replaced by less environmentally harmful alternatives.- Dencam will continuously endeavor to reduce the companies' consumption of irreplaceable resources by, among other things, saving energy and extending the lifespan of products.- In the choice of raw materials and consumables, Dencam will constantly endeavor to reduce the environmental impact and strive for recycling where practical and economically feasible.- Dencam will obtain adequate information on all substances used in production and arising during the processes and use the knowledge gained as a basis for proper handling and in the assessment of alternatives.- Dencam will advise and, where appropriate, put pressure on suppliers and customers if deemed necessary for the implementation of the company's health, safety and environmental policy.- Dencam will monitor that the health and safety of employees is not jeopardized when working with company materials and processes, including reducing risks and eliminating work-related hazards wherever possible.- Dencam will endeavor to continuously improve the working conditions in the companies.- Dencam will ensure that all employees have the information, training, and work routines necessary to fulfil the working environment requirements and to avoid pollution.- Dencam works consciously against offensive behavior, including bullying and sexual harassment.- Human rights will be respected unconditionally.- Any form of attempted bribery and corruption is not accepted.- It is the responsibility of the company's senior management to communicate a continuous improvement philosophy throughout the organization with the aim of creating continuous improvements in quality, service and price to the customer base.- Dencam undertakes to comply with all legal and other applicable requirements imposed on the company.- Dencam undertakes to consult and involve employees, including AMO.

Dencam Composite Whistleblower Channel
As an employee, vendor, or customer you can report serious matters anonymously or if you have reasonable suspicion of such matters.Link for reporting incidents: https://whistleblowersoftware.com/secure/9a1b9bc9-76cd-45a6-b41f-a83c313947d2 Anonymous reporting of serious mattersThrough this page, you can submit information about reprehensible matters or report actions that are unethical, illegal or in violation of internal policies.The scheme is to be used to bring matters to light that would not otherwise have come to light.It can be reported confidentially with indication of name and contact information or, if desired, 100% anonymously.All inquiries are treated confidentially and securely.HR related mattersHR related matters cannot be reported in this system, but must instead be discussed with the immediate manager, director or HR.From this page you are able to make a new secure report or follow up on an existing report.You can read more about the whistleblowing legislation in EU here.Here you can read about what you should know before submitting a report.
Dencam Supplier Blacklists
The Supplier acknowledges that Dencam Composite A/S is committed to conducting business in an ethical and socially responsible manner. Accordingly, the Supplier shall at all times adhere to the requirements stated in the blacklists uploaded to the Dencam Composite website and to the links in either Dencam's supplier contract or code of conduct. The blacklists shall include, but not be limited to, lists of countries, organizations, entities, and individuals with whom Dencam Composite A/S and its affiliates do not conduct business or engage in any transactions.The Supplier hereby agrees that it shall not engage in any transactions with any party listed on such blacklists or supply products containing these written and specified materials, without obtaining prior written consent from Dencam Composite A/S. The Supplier shall conduct all due diligence necessary to ensure that its suppliers, agents, and sub-contractors comply with this clause.Any breach of this clause by the Supplier shall be deemed a material breach of this Agreement, and Dencam Composite A/S shall have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately upon notice to the Supplier.Vestas: https://www.vestas.com/en/sustainability/environment/managing-chemicalsSiemens Gamesa: https://www.siemensgamesa.com/en-int/sustainability/suppliersLM Windpower/GE: Grid Solutions Document Management Rules

Name: SH Group
Description:
We are an international company in the development, production and servicing of hydraulic and mechanical system solutions for the offshore, marine and industrial sectors. 

Founded in 1974, we currently employ more than 350 qualified employees at the headquarter in Svendborg, the service department at Lindø Industrial Park in Odense - and now in Sandnes, Norway.

In 2012 we acquired the Norwegian company, Sepro AS which is a leading engineering and manufacturing company whose primary activities include systems for subsea handling operations.  

At the headquarter in Svendborg we have a ground area of 45.000 m2 and more than 10.500 m2 buildings.

Visit www.shgroup.dk for more information.

Maritime Handling Systems
We won’t rest until we have engineered a smarter maritime handling system.
What we offer
We manufacture and supply custom-made maritime handling systems and deck equipment globally for the marine, offshore and wind industries.We do everything in-house from A-Z to ensure quality control, reducing installation and testing time on site.
Product overview
Segments and industries
Every market has unique needs and requirements. We provide a wide range of high-end technology solutions and services to overcome any challenges that need to be solved. We take pride in being able to provide the services needed within each market.
World of Service
Sales and service
Pushing the boundaries on open water on multiple levels, we stay true to our inherited dedication to service, supporting the customer’s business no matter what, With just one point of contact, we deliver easy and close collaboration, from start to finish.
Let's get in touch
LARS systems
Maximise your operational stability with our cutting-edge launch and recovery systems. Engineered for high performance in challenging marine environments.
Electrification
Transform your maritime operations with our advanced electrification solutions. Elevate efficiency while reducing your carbon footprint.
Wind Industry
Harness the power of wind with our robust and efficient handling systems, designed for the unique demands of offshore wind installations.
Infrastructure
Bridging design and functionality. Our hydraulic, electrical and automation solutions make advanced bridge systems move.
Service
One point of contact for all your service needs. Minimize downtime with our rapid response and in-house spare parts manufacturing.

Changing the game at sea
Maritime handling technology and service solutions
The story so farSince the beginning, people at SH Group have never been satisfied with existing practices. By mastering and innovating the interplay between hydraulic, mechanic, and electric competences, SH Group repeatedly succeeds in engineering new handling solutions that increase operational stability in unstable weather conditions, storms, underwater currents, and rough seas.We are those who won’t rest until we have engineered a smarter solution. All our more than 400 employees are driven by the goal to engineer better, smarter technology systems that not only solve a specific customer’s challenge but set new standards for all those that operate at sea, such as the Sepro and E-ship systems. Pushing the boundaries on open water on multiple levels, we stay true to our inherited dedication to service, supporting the customer’s business no matter what, with just one point of contact for easy and close collaboration.We develop solutions that will change your business. Starting in 2021, SH Group again succeeded in developing a new way of thinking. Strengthening its offers for the defence market, SH Group introduces The Cube System, a new, flexible technology to a traditional industry, increasing operational efficacy. After many years of developing solutions for different industries, SH Group today focuses on providing maritime handling technology and service solutions within three focus industries: Defence, Energy, and Marine Electrification.Smart Handling solutions.
We are a service company operating worldwideWe are a manufacturer and global supplier of tailor-made handling systems and deck equipment for the marine, offshore and wind industries

Name: Soltech
Description:
Soltech is your provider of contract product development, prototyping and small scale production of medical devices.

At Soltech we have a well equipped in-house tool shop and a dedicated team of engineers, technicians and specialists, all with a background in a craftsman trade. Utilizing the practical knowledge of the staff theoretical ideas and concepts can easily and fast be turned in to prototypes or final products.

We enter product development projects at any stage from idea to finished product. We design and build prototypes as well as production equipment and we produce in small scale in our class 8 cleanroom. An essential part of our services is ensuring a successful transfer of technology to full scale production facilities.

We specialize in production of medical devices and therefore have a great knowledge of requirements for materials, surface finish, weldments and cleanliness.

By z0myhu
ISO-class 8 Cleanroom Production
Cleanroom Production
Our cleanroom allows us to develop and produce products in a highly controlled environment. The standard of the cleanroom is ISO-class 8.After many years of experience in developing medical solutions, it was a logical step in the development of Soltech to build a cleanroom. It allows us to provide our clients with demonstration models and prototypes that are useable in a clinical setting.We make small scale production for in vivo testing, clinical studies or for market entry prior to a technology transfer to large scale production.​

Prototyping​
In many projects, building a prototype can be costly and often consumes valuable time.Having Soltech build prototypes is a low risk solution that can give you a clear view of the processes involved, the tangible design, and the cost efficiency of the finished product. ​After building a functional prototype, we will have gathered enough information to eliminate many of the child diseases of a potential full scale production.​

Name: Novenco Marine & Offshore
Description:
With more than 70 years of experience, Novenco Marine and Offshore is one of the largest high-quality heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and refrigeration system suppliers to the marine and offshore industry. 

With production facilities in China and a manufacturing collaborator in Europe, we handle a great part of the HVAC/R equipment ourselves - also if custom-made products are needed. We handle the project management and the detailed HVAC/R design including heat load, pressure drop and sound level calculations. We make all drawings as 2D or 3D drawings and handle required installation drawings for turnkey projects.

Novenco Marine & Offshore’s history dates back to 1947 in Denmark and is currently represented with offices in five countries combined with a broad network of agents in 22 countries, ensuring that we can offer a local service in the key ship and offshore building regions all over the world.

Solutions
Our solutions
We are here to secure and improve the well-being and safety amongst people on ships and offshore installations all over the world. Whether it is to secure the safety of function in critical technical installations, the safety of your crew working in an engine room or on an offshore platform, or the well-being of your cruise customers, we have the right solutions. We push the limits of energy efficiency and quality through innovation and professionalism and have done so for more than 75 years. From our offices in Denmark, Norway and China, we have the ability to solve your HVAC&R challenges all over the world
See a selection of our solutions and products below and please contact us for specific inquiries.
Project execution
Novenco executes and delivers all types of projects to customers around the world. The range of the complexity for each project varies from small equipment orders to large complex projects within the segments we serve. With our customers in focus, we utilize our dedicated and well-proven Project Execution Model (PEM) for execution of all projects. Our PEM is constantly reviewed and improved, which enables us to deliver projects with the correct level of quality and timing according to the requirements of our customers. Projects are executed by our competent and highly skilled staff, and we believe that by having all relevant knowhow and execution/engineering disciplines in-house allows us to perform comprehensive assignments through professional project execution.
Through our extensive range of qualified 3rd party suppliers combined with our own range of products and factories we have a supply chain that can support all project demands and certification requirements.

Home / News / Shock testing workshop
Shock testing workshop
We recently welcomed Thornton Tomasetti Defence Ltd. to our Oslo office for a workshop focused on shock-rated HVAC&R for navy vessels.This workshop provided valuable insights into the science and practicalities of designing equipment that meets navy shock requirements, as well as the testing procedures used to confirm compliance.Shock testing plays a vital role in verifying our HVAC&R solutions operate flawlessly – with no compromise on performance or safety, even under extreme conditions. Our expertise in modern shock standards and advanced testing methods ensure you have a reliable HVAC&R partner for even the most demanding navy projects.Thank you for a valuable workshop.If your interested in learning more about our shock tested equipment for the navy segment, please reach out to us at novenco@novencogroup.com.

Home / After Market, Service & Parts
After Market, Service & Parts
With more than 75 years of experience, we know and understand the importance of timely and skilled After Sales service. Our extensive experience as a HVAC system supplier has provided us with unique knowledge where we continuously seek to improve our services provided from around the world.After Market key services:Spare partsCommissioningOperator trainingInspectionRetrofit/upgrades of existing fleet with the purpose of, for example, product and system life extensions or energy optimizationsServiceService contractsPreventive maintenanceRepairsFurther, we can offer cloud solutionInstallation and programmingOnline supportSystem performance monitoringNovenco interactive, Call-4-service conceptSupporting any delivered Novenco product or system, ensuring high performance and long-life reliability for the user, is our core competence. Based on an extensive service and operating experience, along with and extensive project data base, we have a unique position to provide expert service timely and effectively all across the world.PartsNo one knows our products better than we do, and we provide OEM-manufactured spare parts and components for all Novenco products or systems. Our spare part sales team is ready to assist with parts for anything ranging from fans and air handling units, to filters and dampers.Further, we can assist with 3rd party deliveries of spare parts by using authorized dealers, ensuring that we can give the best possible service to our customers.  For delivery of parts, please send us an email with all details to:Parts@novencogroup.com Novenco is a member of ShipServ, which allows customers to use E-Commerce.ShipServ is the leading online maritime marketplace, helping buyers and sellers to easily find each other and trade efficiently.Check our profile hereHighly skilled Service EngineersOur service engineers are highly skilled, trained and certified in every detail of our HVAC&R and our large equipment portfolio. We provide engineers with the required competencies for the job. This includes valid offshore, ATEX and cooling certificate. Additionally, discharge books are available in case it is needed to embark vessels globally to complete the job.What do you need? And where?Service and annual inspection visits are conducted worldwide through our certified partners or by our own trained service engineers:Maintenance, repairs and replacement of HVAC systems and individual componentsSystem upgrade and optimization to reduce power consumptionAdvice on optimizing day-to-day operationsOn-site training and instruction of operating staffAirflow balancingNovenco cloudRemote system monitoring and troubleshootingNovenco onboard live Call-4-serviceNovenco After Sales is based at our headquarters in Koege, Denmark, where we have skilled engineers ready to provide technical support such as:Assistance on selection of spare parts for a wide range of service and maintenance jobsAdvice on replacement of discontinued productsTroubleshooting and fault findingAdvice regarding control equipment and softwareAdvice and technical information on HVAC systems and componentsAnnual inspections for HVAC and Provision coolingDetailed reporting and maintenance schedule can be provided upon inspectionA detailed parts list can be provided upon inspection

Home / About us
About us
With more than 75 years of experience within our field, we are among the world leaders in supplying HVAC&R systems. We develop and manufacture high-quality heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and refrigeration solutions for marine and offshore applications.Our visionWe are recognized as the no. 1 HVAC&R partner in all markets we serve.Our missionWe provide reliable HVAC&R solutions adapted to our customers’ needs through our committed organization.Our valuesIn Novenco Marine & Offshore, we live through our values, click to learn more; Customer focus, Performance, Commitment, Cooperation and RespectAbout us & our historyNovenco was established in Denmark in 1947, and today, Novenco Marine & Offshore employs about 200 employees worldwide.We improve the life quality of people by creating a healthy indoor climate; we have done this for more than 75 years within the marine and offshore industry.We are among the world leaders in supplying HVAC&R system, and we develop and manufacture high-quality heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and refrigeration solutions for marine and offshore.Novenco has the full value chain, and all parts of the chain consists of committed and passionate employees that constantly strive to keep our customer in focus. Our offices are placed in 3 countries combined with a broad network of agents represented in 20 countries, ensuring that we can offer local service in the major ship and offshore building regions. Our goal is to offer environmentally responsible and energy-friendly solutions that meet even the most demanding global comfort and safety requirements. Our site in Norway is certified in accordance with ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 27001:2017. Furthermore, our factory in Wuxi, China is certified in accordance with ISO 14001:2015.Our factoryOur factory is located in China in the Wuxi Jiangsu province and employs 40 people. It was established in 2007 and covers an area of 5800 square meters. The factory provides high-quality HVAC&R products for the marine and offshore industry and ships it to customers worldwide. The factory produces products such as Air Handling Units, Cabin Units, Chillers, Self-contained Units and many more.Other factories and workshopsBy being a part of the Hi Air Korea group, we have access to several factories in Korea where we can manufacture Novenco equipment.We also have cooperation with workshop in Norway where we manufacture Novenco equipment.Through this, we can significantly increase our capacity or optimize logistics in projects without compromising the Novenco quality – all of this to meet the requirements from our customers.Supply chainThrough our extensive range of qualified 3rd party suppliers combined with our own range of products, we will select the right solutions for our customers to suit their specific need. No matter if it is a highly advanced and customized offshore project or an off the shelf product for a merchant vessel – we will find the right solution!Management system and other qualificationsOur site in Norways is certified in accordance with:– ISO 9001:2015 for Quality Management– ISO 27001:2017 for Information Security MangementRead our Quality Policy statement hereRead our Information Security Policy statement hereOur factory in China is certified in accordance with:– ISO 14001:2015 for Environmental ManagementNovenco is part of the Work Groups who are responsible for reviewing and revising the following technical standards:– ISO15138 – Petroleum and natural gas industries – Offshore production installation – Heating, ventilation and air conditioning– NORSOK H003 – Heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) and sanitary systemsNovenco is a member of the CE Marking Association

Name: System TM A/S
Description:
System TM is a leading global supplier of highly advanced automated handling systems to the solid wood industry, headquartered in Odder, Denmark. We have been succeeding through continuous product development and highly skilled employees, with broad skillsets in design, installation, commissioning and training, service, and maintenance.

We are experts at optimizing your staff and wood resources. For more than 45 years, we have been supplying our customers with customized solutions (from production line design and development to installation and staff training) and are continuously providing standout service for countless lines running worldwide.

All our products and solutions are developed to increase your machine capacity and efficiency, while significantly reducing labor cost at the same time. Our material handling systems are available as standard, as well as fully customized solutions, which means we can every customer’s specific needs.

At System TM, we are experts at optimizing your staff and wood resources. System TM offers a wide range of intelligent, automated handling systems, designed and developed to increase your machine capacity and efficiency, as well as reduce your labor costs significantly.\nSystem TM is a total supplier and offers you everything from production line design and development, installation and staff training, to service and maintenance. We meet all types of customer-specific needs. As a result, our material handling systems are available as standard system solutions and fully customized solutions.\nNEWS\nSystem TM at LIGNA 2025: A New Look, A New Hall, A New Chapterby Aislinn Esterle LIGNA 2025 was more than just a trade fair—it marked a defining moment in the history of System TM. Today, System TM is a leading global producer of high-performance timber processing systems for the solid wood industry and will be [...]System TM Enters Next ChapterBy Aislinn Esterle With over 45 years of experience, System TM is a household name in the global solid wood industry. Earlier this year we became a full member of the HOMAG Group, marking a significant milestone in our history. To be clear, we haven't moved house. Explore System TM’s optimized system solutions for the solid wood industry. Products
PRODUCTS
At System TM, we meet all customer needs. Whether you seek single products or customized material handling solutions, you’ve come to the right place. All our products are designed to provide maximum utilization of staff and wood resources.
System TM is a full solution provider. Using our wide product selection, we customize material handling solutions that give you excellent production capacity and labor cost reductions.
OPTI-FEED
Automated feeding machine
The Opti-Feed automated feeding machine provides great production capacity and many labor cost reductions. The Opti-Feed feeds workpieces of random or uniform lengths.
OPTI-KAP
Optimizing cross-cut saw
The Opti-Kap optimizing cross-cut saw provides maximum utilization of wood and staff resources. If high production capacity, cut accuracy, speed and efficiency is what you’re looking for, let us do the job for you.
OPTI-STACK
Automated stacking machine
The Opti-Stack automated stacking machine is designed to boost main machine capacity and to decrease labor costs. The Opti-Stack stacks workpieces of random or uniform lengths.
OPTI-JOINT
Automated finger jointer
The Opti-Joint finger jointer provides maximum precision, jointing quality and performance. The Opti-Joint finger jointer optimizes staff and wood resources using its intelligent control system.
OPTI-SOLUTION
Customized material handling solutions
Our material handling solutions are designed, developed and customized according to your needs. When it comes to integrated systems, integrating our machinery with your current machinery is also our strong suit!

Total Supplier
TOTAL SUPPLIER
System TM offers comprehensive, one stop solutions for all customer needs. Our solutions are developed based on effective project management and strong, longstanding collaborations with our partners. Whether you seek single systems or entire production plants, we have got you covered throughout the entire life span of your System TM machinery.
Total supplier – from the very beginning to the very end
By choosing System TM, you’ll benefit from our high level of company seniority, as well as our broad skills in project management, design and manufacturing, installation and commissioning, and service and maintenance.
At System TM, we guarantee 100% customer satisfaction. We provide full mechanic and software integration between all main machines and create system solutions that never fail to meet your capacity requirements.
Make a wise move – choose a leading expert to optimize your staff and wood resources. Choose System TM!

Service contracts
Service contracts
Operation and maintenance service contracts cover all essential aspects and activities related to
running your production line safely and economically in order to maximize your uptime and profits.
Service contract
Even the best machines need maintenance every now and then to stay efficient and reliable. Thus, preventive maintenance proves cheaper in the long run.
At System TM, operation & maintenance services are tailored to your needs. By entering a customized service agreement with System TM, you can sit back, relax and generate maximum productivity and profit, while we take care of your maintenance needs.
Our service technicians will visit your factory periodically to examine your equipment, perform necessary adjustments and repairs, give advice on performance optimization and prepare condition reports.
Discounts on maintenance and spare parts, training new operators, online access and software updates are just a few of the many advantages you can benefit from when you enter an operation & maintenance service contract.
Procedure of preventative maintenance visits:Document preparation for periodic preventive maintenanceVisit report preparation and operation history of machinesDevising training programs for customer personnel and operatorsAddressing possible optimizing proposals/system updates approved and ordered by customers
Spare parts procurement
At your premises:Thorough examination of the machine in accordance with customized inspection forms.Preparation of report concerning the condition of the machine, including recommendations regarding day-to-day care and maintenance.Adjustment of chains, belts, couplings and brakes.Lubrication of vital parts, including check of gear oil.Inspection of sensors and pneumatics/hydraulics.Repairs of the machine are carried out.Parts are exchanged and the machine is readjusted.Installing potential optimizing proposals or system update approved and ordered by the customer, to further optimize the production and capacity.Testing of the machine.Examination of the spare parts warehouse at the customer’s premises and ordering of missing parts.Customer acceptance of the service performed.Suggestions to further optimize the production and capacity.
Upon return to System TM:The service report is completed and forwarded to the customer.The visits report and the history of the machine are updated.Quotations of any potential optimizing proposals are forwarded to the customer.New spare parts are sent to the customer.

Opti-Solution
Opti-Solution
Our customized system solutions are designed, manufactured and tailored according to your production needs. System TM lines are highly integrated and optimized in terms of production capacity, yield, and need for manpower.
Opti-Solutions
With more than 45 years of experience and more than 1.200 running lines worldwide, System TM is a leading global supplier of customized solutions to the solid wood industry.
Our customized system solutions include the latest technology and high levels of machine-to-machine integration. They’re designed with minimum need for human intervention and high levels of self-regulation to uphold maximum manufacturing efficiency, uptime and use of wood resources.
At System TM, we advise customers by drawing on our technical expertise and knowledge to find the best solution that fits your needs. We meet customer specific needs by using the latest technology, unique project organization and close customer collaboration.
AdvantagesSolutionsBrochureAdvantages
System TM’s lines are characterized by:System TM’s optimizing software – the only software available optimizing on both wood resources and the overall line capacity.
System TM’s individual design. The lines are individually designed and manufactured, always considering the customer’s production and main machines. This ensures our customers high-performance materials handling, and 100% workpiece control throughout the line.
Complete hard- and software integration between all functions of the line.
The best return on investment.
Low labor costs and optimal utilization of the wood, ensure our customers to stay competitive in the global market.
Higher efficiency for all main machines.
Automatic production changeover from one central computer.

Name: MillPart A/S
Description:
MillPart has one of the most modern plants in Denmark. The management has over two decades of experience within hydraulics and the company specialises in advanced milling and machining of products for hydraulic systems. The company produces high-quality finished subcomponents. The company’s structure and high-tech production facilities enable it to produce small and large serial orders

MillPart is a young company that is growing quickly and a company that is focused on commitment, development and technology. The company believes in long-term partnerships. 


The company’s goal is to be the leader within its area of competence. MillPart aims to be both the customer’s suppler of choice and the key purchaser to its own subcontractors. The company will achieve these goals by being able to offer unbeatable know-how and the best advice, by utilising the latest technology and providing competitively priced, high-quality products. 

MillPart invests in long-term partnerships with customers and subcontractors alike. The aim is to develop and create conditions for growth for all concerned. 

MillPart wants to offer its employees the best possible workplace as well as interesting and fulfilling jobs. The company operates in an informal environment, where dialogue and inclusivity are paramount – a place of work where everyone is valued and has a voice.

Production By Specification
30. March 2016/  Martin Fjord Tarbensen / Products and Solutions
MillPart persistently strives to be among the most modern machine factories. We are always at the forefront of the latest technology and the most efficient production philosophies. Our production is based on a number of production lines with CNC machining centers and competent operators. Our organization and high-tech production allows us to offer both small and large series within a wide range of materials.
MillPart has a comprehensive range of standard and special tools, and the service of our advanced machinery is mainly via the robot. We believe in a high degree of automation wherever possible, choosing technological methods rather than manual work. This means that we are highly competitive in both price and quality.
Documentation
MillPart have invested in the most advanced testing equipment available on the market. The detailed verification not only serves as documentation for the customer, but also very much to the exportation of the perfect processing of the product.
The documentation helps to ensure products of the highest quality. It is a guarantee that the product is exactly as the specifications require, down to the smallest tolerance.top

Full Traceability
30. March 2016/  Martin Fjord Tarbensen / Products and Solutions, TQM
We offer full traceability of all MillPart products. Through a SQL server, customers can at any time find history on their products. Traceability include linked to a serial number and includes: Material certificate, proof of ultrasonic testing, statistical process control, documentation for thermal deburring, 3D coordinate measuring report and ISIR (Initial Sample Inspection Report).
Traceability ensures that it is always possible quickly and safely to go back and find all relevant documents relating to a product. Traceability are therefore a very large value for the end customer.
Additionally, each part is engraved with a unique serial number.top

Production Part Approval Process
30. March 2016/  Martin Fjord Tarbensen / TQM
The purpose of the PPAP is a formalized and systematic manner to ensure that the component supplier,  in this case MillPart, understand the customer’s design requirements and other specifications and can produce products accordingly. The so-called PPAP package contains a number of documents , described below , to be approved by both MillPart and client before a production.
Potential Failure Mode and Effect Analysis of Processes (P-FMEA)
P-FMEA is a risk management tool which helps the company to systematically identify, analyze and manage potential defects in the production process . Using the tool you can eliminate or reduce the error in the decreasing order of impact , frequency and availability. FMEA is one of the most recognized risk management tools.
Control Plan Requirements
MillPart constantly works to optimize products and processes. The Control Plan describes a system that allows us to control the production process and ensure that the product is manufactured correctly.
Initial Sample Inspection Report (ISIR)
ISIR is a preliminary survey report which ensures that all requirements of drawings are met and there therefore no arose a fault in the establishment of the production processes. Measurements shall be made and comply with all the design specifications before production can begin. This ensure a flawless product.
Gage Repeatability and Reproducibility (Gage R&R)
Within manufacturing you are very dependent on various measuring instruments to verify that the components are exactly as they should be. Measurements, however, are never quite exact, and using the Gage R & R, you can make a measurement uncertainty analysis.
Gage R & R is a statistical method to quantify the amount of potential errors in the measurement system. With a Gage R & R analysis can compare the variation that occurs in the measuring system of the tolerance for the target and thus determine whether the method of measurement is useful or corrected.
Capability Study
The Capability Study is used to ensure that the production meets the specification requirements and expectations , as well as determine the extent to which it could do so in future . A Capability Study can also help to identify opportunities for improvement of the production process.
8D Problem Solving
8D is a tool designed to help solve the complex problems that you do not know the reason. Troubleshooting via 8D is a structured 8-step process in which a team made ​​up for the task systematically through all the processes involved so that the error is found, resolved and the necessary measures taken so that the problem does not occur Again.top

Name: VARO Machinery
Description:
VARO develops and manufactures both standard and customised automation and production machinery within the pharmaceutical, chemical, food and non-food industry. 

In our Danish headquarters for VARO Group our 100 dedicated employees are always trying to find the very best solutions for our customers. We develop, design, assemble and install all our machinery ourselves, which means that we have all relevant competencies under one roof. This creates a highly innovative work environment, which benefits our customers.

Find out more about VARO and our products at: 
www.varomachinery.com

Historie
Corporate Social Responsibility
Hvem er VARO?
VARO udvikler udstyr, der effektiviserer produktionen og skaber ensartede kvalitetsprodukter. Vi har lavet maskiner siden 1935 og ved, hvordan man laver de mest optimale løsninger.
KOMPETENCER Hos VARO har vi en bred vifte af kompetencer samlet under samme tag. Det betyder, at vi effektivt og professionelt kan håndtere jeres projekt fra analyse og idé-udvikling til konstruktion, montage og installation. Vi har med andre ord både ideerne og de medarbejdere, der kan føre dem ud i livet.
LØSNINGER VARO laver både special- og standardløsninger. Vores specialløsninger er til de unikke produktionsprocesser, hvor standardudstyr ikke slår til. Det kan være en enkel funktion eller en kompleks produktionsproces. Vores standardudstyr er kvalitetsløsninger, der er baseret på gennemtestede teknologier og processer.
BRANCHER Over årene har vi leveret løsninger til en lang række brancher. I de senere år har vi haft stor aktivitet inden for life science, fødevarebranchen og non-food branchen, hvilket har sat barren højt for vores produktudvikling. Uanset branche er vi dog altid klar til en snak om, hvad vi kan hjælpe jer med. Hos VARO tænker vi nemlig først og fremmest i funktioner, teknik og løsninger.
Kontakt os og hør mere om, hvad VARO kan tilbyde din virksomhed.
Social engagement
I lokalområdet
Det er meget vigtigt for VARO, at vi bidrager aktivt og positivt til vores lokalområde.
Dette gør vi ved bl.a. at støtte lokale madsteder ved arrangementer og gæstebud, ved at sponsorere vores lokale festival Rosenholm Festival, ved at hjælpe med finansiering af ny multibane til vores lokale skole, samt ved at aftage praktikanter og åbne vores faciliteter og viden for Hornslet skole. Bl.a. har vi haft klasser på besøg i forbindelse med innovationsprojekter og digital dannelse. Hermed bidrager vi aktivt til at gøre en forskel for vores lokalområde.
Miljø
VARO gør aktive indsatser for at støtte miljøet både inde og ude. Vi bidrager f.eks. aktivt ved at fremme den vilde natur på vores cirka 2.000 kvadratmeter græsarealer som partnere i Vild med Vilje. Vi arbejder på at skabe en større mangfoldighed af planter og dyr på vores arealer – til glæde for både naturen, vores medarbejdere og lokalsamfundet. Vi er stolte af, at være de første partnere fra industrisektoren til Vild med Vilje. Læs mere om vores konkrete indsats her: https://www.vildmedvilje.dk/varo/

Kundereferencer
Hvem er VARO?
Projektforløb
Management
VARO-gruppen
Historie
VARO-gruppen: inspiration og synergi
VARO-gruppen består af tre brands, der dækker forskellige kundegrupper og kompetencer:VARO
CAMPEN
BjørnkjærVARO udvikler og producerer special- og standardmaskiner som beskrevet her på siden.
CAMPEN producerer store valsebaserede anlæg. De primære forretningsområder er belægningsanlæg til tæppebranchen, komplette airlaid-anlæg og fremstilling af udstyr til nonwoven-produktion.
BJØRNKJÆR producerer inddampnings- og destillations-anlæg til industrielt spildevand og opløsningsmidler.
Alle medarbejdere i VARO-gruppen arbejder i det daglige tæt sammen. Det skaber en stærk synergi på tværs af de forskellige forretningsområder, og vi kan både i idé-fase og produktion hente inspiration hos hinanden og trække på hinandens erfaringer.

Specialmaskiner
Stor erfaring med specialmaskiner til life science
VARO har i mange år udviklet avancerede specialmaskiner til life science & farma-industrien. Vi har både været primærleverandør til nogle af branchens største spillere og underleverandør til andre højt specialiserede udstyrsproducenter. VARO har blandt andet udviklet specialudstyr til:Inspektionsmaskiner
Insulintester
Ampulhåndtering
VialhåndteringVores store brancheerfaring betyder, at vi har en dyb forståelse for de skarpe krav til udstyr, sporbarhed og validering af specialmaskiner til life science branchen. Det indtænker vi derfor i alle faser af et life science projektforløb - fra den første spæde idé til analyse, udvikling, produktion, installation og igangsætning.
"Varo har som en kompetent samarbejdspartner igennem mere end 10 år nu hjulpet InnoScan til at blive en af verdens foretrukne leverandører af inspektionsmaskiner med stor vækst i både omsætning og indtjening. Samarbejdet har bygget på stor faglighed, åbenhed og en fælles holdning om, at kunden kommer først."
Mads Peter Lübeck, Adm. Direktør, InnoscanKontakt os og hør mere om vores erfaringer inden for området

Pakkesystemer
Specialmaskiner
Specialmaskiner til håndtering og pakning
VARO har udviklet en lang række løsninger til håndtering og pakning af produkter. Disse løsninger automatiserer monotone og nedslidende arbejdsopgaver. Det skaber en mere effektiv produktion og forbedrer arbejdsmiljøet.
Vores systemer kan håndtere et væld af forskellige produkt- og emballagetyper.  Det betyder også, at flere af anlæggene ubesværet kan kombinere forskellige produkttyper og pakkemønstre.
VARO’s løsninger har fokus på:Høj kapacitet
Høj fleksibilitet: emballagetyper, pakkemønstre mm.
Automatisering af manuelle opgaverKernen i en sådan løsning er typisk en velkendt teknologi, der herefter tilpasses til at løse netop jeres udfordring.
Som eksempler på specialudviklede pakkeløsninger kan nævnes:Pakning med tøris: højeffektiv pakning, der holder fødevarer kolde under transport
Forsendelsespakning: folder og hæfter pap om produkter, der skal sendes (f.eks. bøger via webshop) - fordelen er, at man kun bruger det pap, der er nødvendigt. Ikke mere, ikke mindre.
Fødevarepakning med tøris: holder fødevarer kolde under transport.
Forsendelsespakning: pakker og hæfter pap om et varierende antal bøger. Velegnet til internetsalg osv.
Tilpassede løsninger til pakning og håndtering
Fødevarepakning med tøris: holder fødevarer kolde under transport.

Specialmaskiner til de unikke udfordringer
VARO har udviklet og leveret specialmaskiner i mere end 80 år. Der er unikke produktionsudfordringer i alle brancher, og vi har udviklet løsninger til mange forskellige produkttyper og produktionsformer. Vores primære fokus i non-food sektoren har været på:Elektronikbranchen: montage- og pakkelinjer, klip af printplader mm.
Maskinindustrien: montagelinjer til pumper, termostater mm.
Plastindustrien: foliehåndtering, pakkelinjer osv.Vores kernekompetencer ligger inden for robothåndtering og automatisering.

Name: SM Industries - Sønderjyske maskinfabrik
Description:
Secondary Offshore Structures  Rotorhouses  Tower Fabrication and  Assembly  Ancillary Components  Custom Steel Solutions 

SM industries, who is owned by Euro Steel, brings decades of experience in producing, delivering, and maintaining steel constructions for the energy sector. We specialize in delivering tailored solutions that meet the demands of all types of projects within renewable and infrastructure energy.

Our production facilities are equipped with advanced robotics and cutting-edge surface treatment equipment, enabling serial and one-off production of steel components to wind turbines, secondary structures and custom-engineered components.

With certifications including DS/EN ISO 9001/14001/45001 and 1090/3834-2, SM Industries ensures every project meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and environmental responsibility.

From large-scale production to intricate custom designs, our high-capacity facilities and skilled team deliver results you can depend on - every time!

Our workforce combines years of experience with unmatched expertise in manufacturing and assembling even the most complex constructions. We ensure precision, efficiency, and reliability at every stage, always delivering on our promise of quality and value.

Power your projects with SM Industries – delivering innovative, precision-engineered steel solutions tailored to meet your needs. From concept to completion, we ensure quality, reliability, exellence and performance every step of the way.

About us
Solar webTower On- and OffShoreA World Leader in Wind Turbine Tower ManufacturingSM Industries has built a long track-record of manufacturing wind turbine towers for both on and offshore wind farms. We supply wind turbine towers to manufactures around the world and we have been in the industry for decades now.Our production plant offers:Five automated head and tailstock black tower production lines that can manufacture large on- and offshore towers - with a weight of more than 230 tons.A tower assembly team that has its own facility where the supplies from the customers are tracked and stored for each specific project.After tower manufacturing and coating, SM Industries installs control cabinets, ladders, cables, lamps and platforms.Taking responsibility for preparing towers so they can be erected directly after leaving the facility.A large storage area with space available for approximately 400 assembled tower sections.Learn more about our tower fabrication and assembly by contacting your SM Industries representative or emailing (MAIL)SustainabilitySM Industries have the world's highest level of reuse in the metallization process producing wind components and towers. Our automated manufacturing metallize with robots equipped with metallization guns. This reduce the process time with over 50%.
Learn moreDo you have a question or need additional information?Contact SM Industries and let us know how we can help.

About us
Solar webService and MaintenanceCustom solutionsBecause Installation is Only The BeginningCustom SolutionsThe service unit at SM Industries is based on its historical connection with utilities. The department has approximately 30 people employed primarily servicing power plants. Typical jobs include contract work on machinery, smaller work shop deliveries, and larger audits of the power plants:Inspection.Repairs.Readjustments.Maintenance.The department has both technical as well as work-shop related back-up from colleagues across the company if special knowledge is needed. SM Industries service includes available staff ready for a rapid reaction to emergency tasks – big and small – around the clock. You have the opportunity to sign a service contract, which provides significant economic and planning advantages in terms of precautionary and ongoing maintenance.Learn more about our service solutions by contacting your SM Industries representative or emailing (EMAIL)SustainabilitySM Industries have the world's highest level of reuse in the metallization process producing wind components and towers. Our automated manufacturing metallize with robots equipped with metallization guns. This reduce the process time with over 50%.

About us
Solar webRotor housesRotor Houses Built on RelationshipsSM Industries manufactures generator rotor houses for direct-drive based wind turbines. As one of the most critical parts of any wind turbine, SM Industries has developed a unique expertise through close co-engineering relationships with our customers, and continually refining its manufacturing processes.This work has led to unique benefits for our customers, including:Wind turbine direct-drive generator rotor houses are manufactured in advanced SM Industries production facilities – fully dedicated to rotor houses.Cutting, beveling and rolling are done together with tacking and welding, and carried out by SM Industries according to relevant quality standards.Learn more about our rotor houses by contacting your SM Industries representative or emailing (EMAIL)SustainabilitySM Industries have the world's highest level of reuse in the metallization process producing wind components and towers. Our automated manufacturing metallize with robots equipped with metallization guns. This reduce the process time with over 50%.
Learn moreDo you have a question or need additional information?Contact SM Industries and let us know how we can help.

Name: DANMATIC AUTOMATED BAKERY SYSTEMS
Description:
Danmatic is a company involved in design, production, sale and service of processing machinery for the Bakery- and Food Industry world wide. We are one of the leading manufacturer and distributors in Scandinavia.

Danmatic’s head office, administration and production facilities are located in Viborg (Jutland). Our sales office is located in Kvistgaard (North of Copenhagen).

Danmatic has for more than 30 years been a privately owned, Danish, company. On March 1st. 2021 we have got new investors, and have become part of Storskogen Group AB. www.storskogen.com

Solutions & Services

About Danmatic
ESG
Contact us
Join us
HomeSolutions & Services
Moving bread forward
Turnkey, consulting and
project development
We design and install integrated turnkey production systems and expansions by selecting and combining the best machines on the market in an integrated solution.
Full lines from ingredients to finished product
For 30 years, Danmatic has designed and installed complete factories and production lines. From the ingredient silos in one end, to finished and packed bread in the other. Including recipe management, production, packing and preparation of orders for dispatch with automated picking and delivery systems.
Efficient process with complete overview
Our process is smooth and efficient, and will save you time, money, and worries. We work closely together with you, and together, we design a customized production setup that meet wishes and requirements for production capacity and quality.
We provide you with an elaborate presentation as well as a setup plan and timeline for the project. Then we start manufacturing the machines,
followed by assembly and commissioning.
You have a complete overview of the project throughout, and we only consider our job done when the gears are spinning, the crumb is soft, and the crust is perfect.
We mix and match for the best solution
To achieve the best possible production setup, we combine our own products with machines and equipment from trusted suppliers. We have the experience to combine machines that work and complement each other in a seamless production line. We only work with selected leading manufacturers in the industry, whom we know and have worked with for years.
If you can create it,
we can automate it
.
In close cooperation with ambitious bakers, we invent new solutions that move automated baking forward.
We believe that the taste, ingredients, look and feel of the bread determine the machine, and not the other way round. Any new innovative recipe should be able to be produced in an automated bakery.
With the end product as a starting point our skilled engineers work closely with bakers and product developers to invent new technology, machines, and production lines for the baked goods of tomorrow.
With insight into technical possibilities and deep know-how of the bakery industry, we see possibilities and solutions that meet specific needs.
30 years of know-how at your service
With more than 30 years of know-how in automated baking we are a trusted advisor for leading bakeries across the world.
Whether you are planning a new bakery, moving production to a new location, creating a new product, working out an alternative production process,
installing a new production line or taking a traditional receipe to large-scale production, Danmatic is your trusted advisor.
Our experienced engineers can assist you in planning and scoping large projects. We contribute with both know-how, up-to-date knowledge and an innovative mindset, that can overcome almost any obstacle and ensures future-proof solutions.
Danmatic after
sales service
.
Flexible service for stable production
We are by your side with Danmatic after sales service. Your Danmatic machine is designed for long life, stability and reliability. To maintain this standard, we offer flexible after sales service for all our customers.
1. Spare parts
All original Danmatic spare parts can be ordered online, by telephone or via e-mail and delivered within a very short time.
2. Remote technical software support
A wireless connection from Danmatic to the machine allows remote support in real time wich gives us the possibility to help solving the problem directly via e-mail or phone during a remote session.
3. Tailor-made inspection
A machine breakdown can often be prevented through regular checks using a specific checklist with focus points so you can order spare parts before breakdown.
4. Preventive maintenance contract
The value of a machine can be maintained in the long run by regular check-ups and maintenance.
Danmatic after sales service offers tailor-made maintenance contracts to all customers.
5. Repair
Complex and sophisticated repairs can be made in-house by Danmatic. You get professional machine repair using original spare parts.
6. Training and skills
Danmatic offer individual machine-specific training sessions for employees to make sure they have the required skills and updated knowledge.
7. Retrofit
At Danmatic we offer retrofitting as well as replacement of discontinued machine parts for new updated parts.

Moving bread forward
We have the cases to prove our flexibility
Throughout the years we have developed a range of standard Danmatic machines that are considered best-in-class and used in bakeries all over the world.
COOP - Albertslund
A desire for a more automated process meant optimisation and savings
During a long preliminary process, Danmatic, together with COOP in Albertslund, investigated possibilities and solutions for a more automated process for unpacking frozen dough elements.COOP faced a newly established bakery, where the desire was to automate production so that the number of hours worked by employees was limited and even employee-saving.
Go to case
Jensen Brød - Aalborg
Increased capacity and cost reductions of up to 35%
The collaboration with Danmatic has been an exciting journey of more than 25 years and has contributed specialised know-how and expertise in the form of unique solutions and new technology implemented at the company. The development focus has primarily been on our decoration and tray handling equipment.

HomeAbout Danmatic
Moving bread forward
Who we are
Danmatic A/S
Our vision
We are our customer’s source of know-how.
Our philosophy
To bring together the best suppliers for the solution combined with our own engineering, based on our customer’s knowledge, product requirements and our experience.
Our goal
To be able to help and support the customer all the way from start to finish. In the process: To bring together different suppliers in order to create the best experience for our customer.
Ownership
Storskogen Group AB acquired the majority of Danmatic A/S March 1st, 2021.
Storskogen acquires and manages small and medium-sized businesses with an infinite ownership perspective. Group turnover was EUR 3.4+ billion in 2021. Danmatic belongs to the Industry & Automation Group with a EUR 1.3 billion turnover. Group members are 122+ small and mid-sized companies with 12,200 FTEs (May 2022).
Latest updates: www.storskogen.com
Founded by an engineer and a baker
We know dough
Danmatic was founded by an engineer and a baker. This combination of know-how on both automation technology and the baking process is still the core of our mindset. The taste, ingredients, look and feel of the bread determine the machine, and not the other way round. If you can create it, we can automate it.
We take pride in creating solutions that fit seamlessly into the full dough processing line – and we only consider our job done when the gears are spinning, the crumb is soft, and the crust is perfect.
Danmatic is your partner in moving automated baking forward. For more than 30 years, we have developed innovative baking technology that sets new standards for the industry.
Standard equipment
We manufacture a range of best-in-class machines used by market leading bakeries across the world.
More than 35 machines within automation of baking processes, from bread decoration and makeup, tray handling systems, rye bread lines, conveyer solutions and many other solutions, has been improved and optimized over 30 years and is now available as a Danmatic standard solution.
New equipment
In close cooperation with ambitious bakers, we invent new solutions that move automated baking forward. Danmatic have developed more than 350 new machines for automation of baking in retail- and industrial bakeries.
TurnkeyWe design and install integrated turnkey production systems and expansions by selecting and combining the best machines on the market in an integrated solution. Eg. from silo to warehouse or a full bread line.
Consulting services
Danmatic offer 30 years of company experience being the customers source og knowhow i.e. consulting services. From pre-studies of new equipment, new product concepts, project management and equipment specifications.
Used by market leading bakeries across the world
Market leading bakeries
Throughout the years we have developed a range of standard Danmatic machines that are considered best-in-class and used in bakeries all over the world.
We are particularly known for our decoration line with the unique moistening roller system that reduce the waste of topping material, for our compact tray handling system, and for our drilling machine for French hotdog.
Hygiene, ergonomics, and efficiency
Three parameters are in focus in all of the Danmatic machines: Hygiene, ergonomics, and efficiency.Fast cleaning gives you less downtime
With our products you will experience easier and faster cleaning, resulting in fewer and shorter production stoppages. We incorporate good hygiene into all our machines. Wherever possible, we have designed the machine so that product residue does not accumulate in hard-to-reach places.
We listen to the customer's needs
We are proud to receive this beautiful bronze sculpture from one of our big customers - one of Europe's top 5 bakeries. The figure represents an ear as an acknowledgment that we listen to the customer's needs and ideas and transforms them into an optimal solution for the customer.
Your partner in moving automated baking forward
Our philosophy
To bring together the best suppliers for the solution combined with our own engineering.
We develop what does not exist. Offer a range of standardized automated equipment with in-depth concept and equipment know-how.
Our goal
To be able to help and support the customer all the way from start to finish.
In the process; To bring together different suppliers in order to create the best experience for our customer.
Facts and Figures
.
1.000 completed projects
Over the years, Danmatic has designed and produced a wide range of equipment and special machines for the bakery industry.
We have contributed to more than 1,000 projects for satisfied customers through our many years in the bakery business.
Our core business
The core business for Danmatic is manufacturing our standard machine programme, custom design, project engineering and equipment supplies including 3rd part equipment and service and maintenance.
Our extensive know-how and expertise make us one of the leading players in the bakery business. We take responsibility for the project from start to finish and ensure that all machines work together in a correct and efficient manner.
..
Core customers
Industrial, mid-sized and retail bakeries and system integrators.
Employees
At Danmatic, we are a strong team with highly specialized employees with average of 15 years seniority. We have highly skilled mechanic engineers. Some of our employees have a background from the baking and bread industry, why we speak same language as our customers. The end product defines the machine, not the other way around.
Financial background
Danmatic A/S is a robust company. We were awarded the AAA credit rating by Dun & Bradstreet in 2001 and have retained it since. We were founded in 1989 with an average seniority of 15 years - and we will be here for many years to come.
.
Proud member of
Download company presentation here
.
Download brochure here
.
We support Crush Cancer and KidsAid
It is with great pleasure that, in our collaboration with Crush Cancer (Knus Kræft) and KidsAid, we support the children and young people who are either socially vulnerable or affected by illness.
